Sorry, I should have said that I replaced the basebuilder plugins with the ones
from N20040517 and the following NPE from PDE build resulted.
You need to get all the osgi and runtime plugins as well.

I'm getting this as well.  I'm using the IES from 05/17.  Are there OSGI 
packages that don't come as part of the base eclipse?

Just to clarify the above comment, we use the IES as a builder, not the eclipse 
base builder.
I do have the all the osgi and runtime plugins and the same error message occurs.

I can generate all the scripts and run them without problem with PDE Build from
HEAD (it is the same that will be in today's build) laid on top of I20040514-0800.

I've done a platform drop using pde build from I 20040518-1622 and it works like
a charm :)

Please re-open, or come and find me if this is still an issue.
